/* * XOR a block of data into the provided state. This supports only * blocks whose length is a multiple of 64 bits. */

function.name: xor_block

unit.comment: /* * Process a block with the provided data. The data length must be a * multiple of 8 (in bytes); normally, this is the "rate". */

function.name: br_shake_init
br_shake_inject
br_shake_flip
br_shake_produce
